website_summaries.verdict: If you want the best hangers available, these are the ones to get. They combine versatile, no-slip design with durable build and a value price that makes this pack of 50 an excellent choice.
pros: Has a feature set that accommodates a wide variety of wardrobe pieces including swivel chrome hooks, durable construction, practical shape, and well-placed strap notches
Consumers rave how clothes won't slip or fall off, thanks to the velvet coating
cons: Works well for most types of clothing, with the exception of weighty items such as coats and heavy suits

website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, black, velvet-lined hangers, slim to save space, made of lightweight yet flexible plastic.
pros: Nonslip velvet material holds clothes in place
shoulder notches for securing thin straps
Chrome-finish hooks swivel 360° for easy access
Durable plastic supports up to 10 lbs
Horizontal velvet-lined bar grips pants and prevent creases
cons: Manufacturer suggests rinsing hangers under cold water before first use
some consumers report hangers broke too easily or shed black lint

customer_reviews.title: Make a huge mess in my closet....infinitely shedding
customer_reviews.text: The velvet of the hangers keep coming off and stick to my hand. I tried to clean it but it doesn't work, is infinitely shedding. Definitely not safe for any of my cloth to use or even put it anywhere. Now I have to clean my closet again and go out to buy new hangers. Wasted my three days to wait for this infinitely shedding hangers, and now also wasting my time to drive to UPS to return it just to get a refund. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie McA

customer_reviews.title: ... only giving them a three because they are not sturdy and break easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving them a three because they are not sturdy and break easily, that's the negative review. On the positive side they do take up less space, they do hold clothes better than any plastic or wire hanger.
customer_reviews.author: R RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great hangers!! I need to buy more. They look nice it's harder for clothing to slip off of the hangers. I love how they look in comparison to the plastic cheap hangers I normally buy from Walmart. However, they do crack easy if one may land on the floor it's fine but if someone (my children) steps on it they will crack which is why I gave it 4 stars out of 5. But the. Again, it's a hangar not a metal pole, so it should crack. Maybe that can be something the manufacturers think of next when modifying the hangars design. (Make then able to be stepped on and not crack so easy.)
customer_reviews.author: Natlee

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to believe that having the same hangers allows you to put MORE THINGS into the closet. I had over 100 plastic cheap store hangers you get from Target/Macys/et al. These hanger are thin, strong, sleek, and GET THE JOB DONE!!! I used the first 100 and I just ordered a 100 more to finish organizing! I really didn't wanna sink money into BUYING something I already had but these allow me to put WAAYYYYYYY more things into my closet plus everything is UNIFORM and eye pleasing. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Saiho Kwan

customer_reviews.title: WHEN I OPEN MY BOX THEY WHERE BROKEN ONES EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I think you know you are selling a pipedream aka junk..... It was a good idea and you are using the wrong material. You are not using enough or strong enough Carbon fiber to do what you say it is suppose to do... When I open the box and see broken hangers is not a good sign and you make know attempt what so ever to correct the situation or show concern??? Give me my money back please... JUST THREW AWAY SOME GOOD MONEY
customer_reviews.author: IF YOU LIE 2 ME: U WILL STEAL FROM ME!!!

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT swivel!  EVER! AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these hangers particularly due to the ability to swivel, these hangers are not made to swivel. As many of the negative current reviews state these are thin junk hangers. I started switching to these type of hangers years ago and have had several different brands from several sources. While these were listed as swivel and strong, they are neither. So I am stuck with 50 flimsy non-swivel hangers. Amazon either needs to update the description on this product or drop it. There were many very high ratings, but the product they are sending out now is obviously NOT the same product that I and so many other customers appear to be getting now.
customer_reviews.author: Zerberbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great hangars!
customer_reviews.text: This are really great. I received mine with no broken hangers. I think because I ordered 2 boxes and they were both shipped in a larger box, it helped prevent damage like others have mentioned. I also took a white pillow case and white dry hand towel to see if the hangar would shed or transfer the black color and it did not transfer. I had never had that happen with other black felt hangars but saw some reviews with comments about the black rubbing off so I wanted to make sure before I started using. I did it on about 6 random hangars from each box and had no transfer.
customer_reviews.author: R. House

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 50 pack of these hangers and at least 10 of them by now have either snapped at the top or broke on the bottom. I have only put summer clothes on them so far nothing heavy and they have disappointed me. Reached out to customer service and it’s been two weeks no replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, I Bought More
customer_reviews.text: My wife couldn’t find what she wanted in a Walmart or Target so she decided to get these on Amazon. Works great she even bought two more. Good for the price. None broken so far after six months of constant use. Quality seems excellent.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Hooked on these hangers
customer_reviews.text: Slowly I have been replacing my plastic hangers with velvet hangers to save space. Most of the ones I have are from a big warehouse store but due to current events, I have not been able to go there. I found these on Amazon and they are a very close match to the ones I already have, except these have a small notch on the top to keep tops with skinny straps from sliding off. I really like the notched top of the hanger, the thinness and the velvet really does help keep clothes from falling off. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: JKGetts

customer_reviews.title: Where did all this closet space come from?
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really think there was a difference in types of hangers. They all do the same thing, hang your clothes. I wanted to see if the hype about velvet hangers had any merit so I got some. And they are definitely different. Idk how it’s possible but just changing my clothes onto these hangers has somehow freed up space in my closet. I got these primarily for the clothes that are silky that typically slid off normal plastic hangers and these are working great. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wwlarado

customer_reviews.title: Nice hanger for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my daughter's dorm room. They arrived on time, in good shape, and were just as described. The hangers may be a little light weight, but are sturdy enough. They do take up considerably less room than regular hangers and are excellent for wide necks and slippery material. I plan on buy some for me, also.
customer_reviews.author: wireman

customer_reviews.title: Stunned!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hangers, no lint upon arrival, no factory smell either, only thing I noticed is that the hook part does not turn. I snapped two trying to do so, woops! Edited to say this company has incredible customer service and have replaced the damaged hangers free of cost. The rest of our hangers do in fact rotate without any issues! Very impressed with the customer service! They more than earned out business for any future hanger needs!
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are great for things that are notoriously hard to hang
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great for things that are notoriously hard to hang. Nothing slips off, and I've used them to everything from camisoles to scarfs, and they don't take up a lot of room in the closet. However, they break pretty easily. I've had quite a few that the hook has snapped off from, or that have just broken in the middle. Yes, I could probably repair it with glue, but I'm finding that I really only need a few of these for those hard to hang items--the regular metal hangers work better for everything else I have.
customer_reviews.author: Macgetticles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are super high quality! If you are replacing plastic hangers with these, make sure you count your clothes because plastic hangers take up so much space they look like there are many more then there actually is! I accidentally fell for that and ordered over double what I actually needed. Oops!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Zober Helped Me Keep a Zillion New Years Resolutions --I Now Hang Up My Cothes
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it. I actually hang up my clothing every day as opposed to throwing the outfit in a chair until the chair is full. The reason for the change in behavior --Zober Premium Quality Space Saving Velvet Hangers. I found it frustrating to place something on a plastic hanger and have it slide off the hanger while trying to place it on the bar. With Zober hangers, nothing slides off there are no clothes on the floor. My closet stays organized because I can push clothing aside to make room for the garments rightful place, I know where everything is and the small closet suddenly has more space. I love them. Way to go Zober!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Joyce Little

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: All hangers arrived in good condition, no breaks. I've been using them for about 3 weeks now and haven't noticed any black fuzz left on clothing, and they've all held up very well. They make my closet look really nice and streamlined, and nothing has fallen off the hangers (even when my cats get in there). I ordered the 50-pack, not even knowing how much clothing I had to hang up, and have about 20 hangers to spare for future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani V.

customer_reviews.title: cheap trash
customer_reviews.text: these hangers are trash. i opened one of the bags that contained 10 hangers and they were almost all broken! even the ones that didn’t appear broken at first fell apart almost immediately when i was looking at the silver hook and trying to inspect its durability. definitely don’t recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: DESCRIPTION IS FALSE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these specifically because these were advertised as 360 degree swivel. NOT AS ADVERTISED. I was willing to pay more for the swivel. As stationary hangers they are OVER PRICED. Would not recommend at all!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Boater

customer_reviews.title: Color transfers & a few broke already
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different brands. These, I purchased black and can only use them on my black clothes as the color transfers a bit. A couple have broke, but seems to be common with velvet hangers. Trade off from being thin and sturdy. But the transfer is my issue and lower rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and product as described. The chrome hooks and black velvet looks very chic in the closet. Hooks are smaller/thinner than my other hangers but not an issue, just different, they look like the ones in the picture if you look closely. I chose this type of hanger because it doesn't leave the odd dents in the shoulder/sleeve area on clothes with thin fabric. Good price, even cheaper than Ross.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed more black hangars for my closet. I did not need 50 more, but for the value, I could pass on it. I saw these and took a chance, they were a return. I was able to hang my everyday jeans, and my jean tops. I had no problem and no breakage. I had no velvet residue, left on my hands or body. I am pretty anal about hanging all my clothes in one direction. So once everything was hung up, it looks so uninformed, and gave me so much more room.
customer_reviews.author: mzndj2u

customer_reviews.title: Not for Petite Clothes
customer_reviews.text: These seem like decent hangers, but they are not suitable at all for petite size clothing. The only way to get some particular pieces on them is to go through the waist because they stretch out the neck when trying to get clothes on them. This makes shoulder bumps on the sleeves...
customer_reviews.author: jedwards

customer_reviews.title: Not for the whole closet
customer_reviews.text: These hangers don't work with all my clothes. It's too difficult to put on tee-shirts and sweaters. The velvet just grips the shirt material too much. This hanger is great for button ups and I'm sure a lot of female clothing that would normally slide off of plastic hangers. So I'm glad I have some of these hangers now for my button ups, but I won't be replacing anymore wire hangers with velvet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good hangers for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Needed to buy MORE hangers bc my S.O. and I have way too many clothes. Our closets are by no means small, and they're full. I was beginning to get worried about how we were going to jam more bulky hangers into the space, when I happened upon these. They're perfect! They're also non-slip which was very needed as I just couldn't keep some things hanging on to plastic hangers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M & W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but had to write one for these hangers. I have now bought over 200 of these hangers to slowly replace all of my old plastic ones. I absolutely love them. I can fit more clothes in my closet, they’re velvet so shirts and dresses don’t slip off of them, and they look soo nice in my closet. Don’t put your wet clothes on them though; keep some plastic ones for that!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: This hangers are okay, they just need to be handled with care and that’s why I’m not giving it 5 stars. Because it has happened to me quite a few times where I pull something out of my closet and stay with only the black thing since the metal broke. That’s very unfortunate. Now I learned I have to be more careful and that’s it, not a big deal but I did want to let you guys know. They do look nice and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: daniela cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not space saving
customer_reviews.text: As you can tell from my pictures they are definitely not space saving (those pictures have the same amount of shirts) but they do make it look nicer and less cluttered. I have never had a problem with them putting black stuff on the clothes (which I was worried about) and they are pretty sturdy as well. The only thing I don't like is that the notches for tank top straps are way too far out to the ends of the hanger, however you don't even need them since the straps don't move on the velvet material anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie JacksonTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have two nice large walk in closets in the master suite and I refuse to put those cheap looking plastic hangers in them, but I don't want to spend an arm and a leg filling them with nicer quality hangers either. These were a great choice. They are a good value and look nice too. The velvet looks classy and holds the clothes nicely. The shape of the hangers helps clothes retain their shape. I was surprised at the quality for the price. Will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These velvet hangers are among the better I have used. Due to the nature of the product in general from all manufacturers, they can break if one tries to hang too bulky and/or heavy garments on them. But these seem to be holding up longer than others I have purchased in the past. Plus I can't see ever returning to the older, slippery hanger style. You just have to be a bit smart in how you treat them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: My closet has never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are a lifesaver for my closet. They have totally helped me revamp and reorganize my closet. I have been able to fully organize my clothes and can now see all the items I have. With their more narrow size, I can fit more in the closet or have more room to move the clothes on the bar. So much better. PLUS, nothing falls of the hangers anymore, the velvet coating helps keep things in place. I love these hangers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: leanne

customer_reviews.title: I will live a life with velvet hangers!!💛
customer_reviews.text: I have hundreds of these! Love them very much because they add a sophisticated look in my closet, unlike the mainstream plastic hangers. These velvet hangers are also thin, which gives more space for more clothes to be hung up. Again, unlike those fat plastic hangers! These are also study and durable, so it's a win win situation! PS: if you need a product reviewed, contact us!
customer_reviews.author: L.A. home

customer_reviews.title: Decent for female clothing
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel nice, but are also a little flimsy, especially coming from wooden hangers. My wife is an average female size so they work well. I'm a big guy at 6'5 so my clothing is alot heavier, so thats no bueno. We kept the wooden hangers for me and used these for hers. They do give more space on her side, so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie02061975

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got these quickly and they seem to be great quality! I have had velvet hangers for several years now, so these are just replenishing my depleted stash. I think the trade off of velvet hangers is they can break my easily (expecially if you accidentally drop them and step on them like I do!). These seem like they will stand up a little better than the last set I bought.
customer_reviews.author: chrislee

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, well made hanger.
customer_reviews.text: Capable and sturdy hangers. Excellent quality that get the job done well. I’ve had these about three months now and not one has broken, frazzled, wilted or shown any other sign of a weakly made sub-standard hanger. We live in a small space and our hangers often do ‘double-duty’ and these and holding up very well. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gower

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these hangers 3X now! For every shipment I have ordered they have all arrived in perfect condition. They also have moveable hanger heads (the ones I have are adjustable). I have hung heavy winter coats on them and heavy jeans and they have held up! I have an awfully packed closet, and they are slim enough to allow me to continue to pack another item into the chaos. LOL
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Improved Closet, Decent Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Little black dust fell off when I removed them from the hangers but I shook them a little before putting my clothes on them - I haven't seen any dust on my clothes (even the white items). The hangers seem a bit flimsy but none have broken, and I have a heavy men's denim coat on one and men's pants on others without sagging. They make the closet look 10x better than any plastic hangers I've ever had and are a fraction of the price I've seen at stores (Target Joy Hangers are $9 for a 10 pack). Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These hangers save so much space in the closet that it's ridiculous! I've not had any shed at all and they don't look too shabby. My clothes stay in place and have not once slid off. The only downside is that if you aren't on the hefty side, you will have to stretch your clothes a lot further to fit on the hangers properly which could damage them if they aren't made of a material that's meant to be stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneOutThere

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, you'll love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! Sturdy, space-saving, non-snagging, stylish (I mean black velvet, come on!), economical, doesn't leave a shoulder hump, can handle heavier clothing, just all around great, for the most part. Only two neutral issues (not really negatives for me) are: 1) the bottom part has some give, but it still holds my slacks/jeans, and 2) I wish they made them maybe a size or two larger for coats/larger items. All in all, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C Shaw

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time purchasing a 50 piece set on Amazon and as always they do their job. Just an fyi.. if you have a local Walmart go there! While waiting for the delivery of these I bought a box of 30 from Walmart for 11.57! I could've bought 2 for the same price as these Amazon ones and came out w 10 extra! But these are great if you're not able to get around, etc.
customer_reviews.author: laura johnson

customer_reviews.title: Space saving!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference these hangers have made in our closet! Their sleek profile allows us to nearly double the amount of clothing we can place in our closets. The velvet texture helps keep the clothing secure and keeps them from falling off. They are sleek, well designed and sturdy. We were so impressed with their quality that we purchased several more. We would definitely recommend these to our family and friends. If you have found this review to be helpful, please click on the button below.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue inside your clothing
customer_reviews.text: They definitely look sleek hanging in the closet and seem sturdy, but unfortunately whatever velvet-like material they’re made off rubbed off on my clothes, so many of my light-colored shirts had to be cleaned. (Wouldn’t be as noticeable if I hadn’t ordered them in black.) In fact, when I first opened the bag they arrived in and unpacked them, there was a ton of black particulate all over the floor that had fallen off the hangers... Kind of gross.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Simpson

customer_reviews.title: They hold clothes nicely, but occasionally break
customer_reviews.text: I've had 50 of these for a month. They are nice an slim, and they're great for keeping clothes from falling off the hanger! I love that they're the full shape so you can use them for tops or bottoms. However, in only a month three have broken. They just snapped. So that isn't awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Benny S

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are so much better than the old style plastic or wood. They maximize closet space and are also good for the clothes. Clothes don't slip off of them, for example. I love these hangers and no longer use any other kind except for very heavy coats where I still need strong, large wooden hangers and the laundry room where I use smooth white plastic hangers for drying out hand washed or damp shirts. If the item is super heavy these won't be strong enough and if the item is wet you won't want to use these with it. Otherwise these are great for everything. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JAJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Hangers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. They are super durable for heavy winter coats. I am currently doing some "summer" cleaning and wanted to store my winter coats away and it held up my husband's bulky heavy coat with no problem. I did not see it bend like it was about to give out like other hangers. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee Miranda

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: This is good for shirts, but not for pants. Too sticky material. Shirt does not come off easily. But the good part is that it is compact and does not occupy too much room on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Soudamini M. Nath

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first batch I recieved.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the box of 50 and really liked them. They were perfect. The second box had a weird smell and I noticed black fuzz all over the table after opening the packages. The smell went away and I haven't seen black fuzz on my clothing, but I'm wary to hang white clothing on them now. Overall seem like good quality, but I don't know if I'd buy again with so many competitors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Isobel Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and will be buying more. They save space but don't expect a miracle. They do make everything look well organized and hold the clothes in place really well. If you are the type who likes to pull your clothes off the hanger effortlessly these will not work for you, you will end up stretching out your collars.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Clothes Hangers
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time I have ordered these hangers as I am replacing all hangers in my home with them. The are the best I have found and love the fact that they not only don't let clothes slip off of them but the are also space conserving. We have a travel trailer and not much closet space so these work excellently there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Clothes don't slip
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Clothes don't slip, can even hang tank tops with ease. Love the look of my closet with all things matching and streamlined. Great product. Had them for about 2 months now, haven't noticed any black velvet on my clothes, also none of the hangers arrived broken or have broken since I've bought them. Generally very pleased with my purchase. As some reviews noted you may need more hangers than you think, the amount of space saved with these is impressive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stong for Coats, Saves T-Shirt Necks, Smoother Organization
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and am very pleased. 1) They save space because they're thin and strong - great for coats on down. 2) They're great for my t-shirts as the no-slip velvet keeps the necks from stretching. Same goes for my sweater which previously required two hangers and folding in half for fear of stretching. Subsequently, 3) the clothes lie flatter against each other, which makes for easier "scrolling" through items in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great for college students!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hangers for my son’s girlfriend, to use in her dorm room at college. She loves the thin design, as it allows more to fit in the closet space available. She likes the velvet cover as it prevents some of her clothing from slipping off the hangers as it tends to on a plastic hanger. Worked great for what she needed!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced all of my plastic hangers with these. They take up less space, let me see into the back of the closet, look great, swivel, and never snap! They also do a great job of holding onto shirts with a wider neckline. Love them! These are the only hangers I will ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: I should have tried these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read about these hangers and passed them over many times. I finally bought these and they are everything they say they are. I can’t believe how much more my closet can hold! Shirts stay on the hanger and no more “hanger” marks! I’ll be getting more of these for certain!
customer_reviews.author: Darin&Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Strong, quality hangers... But the coating sheds! Very messy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thin for more space in the closet. The hangers seem pretty strong and durable. But beware, the coating sheds. You will have black particles all over your whites and lightly colored clothing. For this reason I'm only giving 3 stars. I literally only use them to hang dark clothing and workout gear, running hoodies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Parris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Pack of 2 x 30 at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: I like these black hangers that you can hang pants on a tank top and a sweater pretty much anything and the great thing about these are that the top metal hanger part adjusts to the left or right so when you hang your clothes on your hangers if you don’t get it on the right side to hang you just switch the metal adjustable part to the other side to get your clothes facing the correct way - however I did find a pack of 30 which I bought 2 of which is cheaper than this deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Adair

customer_reviews.title: garments don't slip
customer_reviews.text: These narrow "fuzzy" hangers keep blouses and other garments from slipping from the hanger and falling on the floor. You can also put more hangers on the closet bar because they are quite narrow. I really like them and have converted from plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Theis

customer_reviews.title: no hanger marks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years. Allows me to store more items in a smaller space, and the shoulder area of my tops are not stretched or "pooched" like they are when plastic hangers are used. Especially like the ability to hang thinner sweaters with no hanger marks.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Speck

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Normally these hangers are so expensive just for 10 so when I saw this deal I couldn't pass it up. I LOVE that I can hang absolutely anything on these hangers and they don't fall off and I have so much more space on my cloest bar to move my clothes side-to-side and actually see all of my options! Word of warning: Do not pull your clothese off the hanger one-handed like you may normally do because the grip is really good and you will snap the hanger, so take the time to remove your clothes from the hanger instead of pulling at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica wainer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I'm deeply in love with these thin velvet hangers. They're super thin, so you can fit a lot more into your closet than you can imagine. However, they break more often than I'd expect. I'm still obsessed with them because my closet looks so organized now. I'll keep ordering them even though some will break.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are perfect. They're sturdy and made well. I've ordered them twice because of the quality. What a difference they make. My closet now has more space and it's much easier to pick out clothes. My clothes now lie smoothly on the hangers. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hemmerick

customer_reviews.title: The best hangers EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or 4th set. I keep replacing my old plastic and metal hangers with these. They keep my pants and shirts from sliding off, are nice and sturdy and I like that the velvet hasn't worn off or come off on my clothes. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: After fighting with clothes constantly sliding off their hangers, I decided to redo my closet (pandemic project). These are perfect. Sturdy and with just enough "tooth" in the covering that those slippy shirts and dresses want to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Bonne L. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Never using plastic hangers again!
customer_reviews.text: No issues! Doesn't come off on clothes, even with wet white laundry! Never going back to plastic hangers if these are so affordable. They look really classy too, much better than plastic hangers in all different colors hahaha. My closet looks way more organized now, I'ml buy more for sure
customer_reviews.author: GabriellaR

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Personally I think these are a waste of money. I like the thicker plastic ones. My girlfriend likes the velvet on these, so I buy them for her. They're not durable and not made for anything heavier than a super lightweight women's shirt. I gave them 5 stars because I knew how weak they were when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: GTT

customer_reviews.title: Light weight... bargain at this price
customer_reviews.text: Ok first of all these are NOT the big strong heavy duty hangers that look very similar that you can buy at say.... Container store. These are a lot more light weight. BUT... these are a fraction of the price of those found elsewhere. So they're definitely worth the price and I'd buy them again. Great for blouses, shirts and other lighter weight items.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Count your hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I love uniformity in my closet. Nice and sturdy. However, if you purchase the 100 pack...count your hangers. I was shorted 20 hangers in this last order. This was my 2nd purchase. They come in bundles of 10. NEW ORDER PLACED: I ordered 100 hangers for the 3rd time, but only received 80. I removed another star. Amazon's customer service was contacted. Otherwise, it's a great product if you don't mind receiving 80 hangers although the description says 100.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are my favorite! They take up less space than those bulky plastic ones and keep your clothes hanging nicely. No more shirts in the floor that slid off the hanger. The metal hanging part is also moveable so you can face your hangers/clothes all the same way
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the space saving of the slim hangers. Everything in my closet is Is arranged by color so, rhe black hangers just fade away. The skirt hangers are great but very difficult to get separated as they are all attached together. Girls, your manicure will take a beating! In the end, it’s all good. Get ‘em!
customer_reviews.author: ALNISA

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are wonderful. They don't bend like the cheap ones. They hold my clothes without slipping and are slim so I get more room in my closet to hang other items. The velvet does NOT come off on your clothes which is great because the Amazon brand ones do. The only downside to the hangers is that even though they are packaged superbly some of my hangers were still broken. But not enough to get mad about. I have ordered 3 boxes and only 3 hangers were broken. These are the best value that I have found, you won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 2Real

customer_reviews.title: Great for slicker fabric, not so much for soft cotton
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in hopes of sparing the shoulder of my shirts the awkward bump from sagging at the ends of regular hangers. Don’t get me wrong they did the job, I think. But the velvet material is much more suited for fabric other than cotton. When hanging my cotton shirts, I found my self needing to tug and adjust them into alignment because the velvet material is just too much friction against cotton. BUT it’s great for jackets o clothing with a slicker fabric. The length of the hanger sits right at the shoulder hem of my Size L tops.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: TRUTH IN ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.text: I like the hangers. They're strong, and they're thin, so they don't take up a lot of space. I don't like them being advertised as having swivel hooks... Not so much! Maybe a couple of the hooks here and there, swivel. And I knew if I attempted to force it, that I'd be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Trulife

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall
customer_reviews.text: Work great, have to watch out with the first few uses of black velvet coming off on white clothes. They can handle most weight, but one I have has started to bend. But I've had for over a year I think and I still use them today with all of them still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Answer to my messy closet problems.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a hanger that doesn’t. These hangers are durable and keep my clothes from falling. Added bonus is they keep my closet looking cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great. They minimize the space my clothes take up since they're so thin, and they also look great themselves. The velvet doesn't rub off onto my clothing either. I have a bunch of different fabrics and straps that usually fall off my old smooth plastic hangers, and now they don't move/slide off at all on these new velvet hangers. The only thing I would say is you can't hang too heavy of a coat on them. I tried to hang a huge snowboarding jacket with it and it split in half. Other than that, they're really sturdy and priced great. I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: randomshopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hangers
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these hangers multiple times because my closet keeps growing. Chose them because they’re thin and save space in my closet and I especially like the swivel hanger because if I put a shirt on it in the wrong direction, I just need to turn the metal piece instead of re-hanging the shirt. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are fabulous for the price. They transformed my closet! They have little notches in them for tanks and strappy dresses too. Not a single one arrived broken or broke while I was putting them up. These are thin hangers y'all you have to be gentle and not yank on them or throw them around. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TSib

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you're closet can actually be beautiful...with these hangers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really slimmed down my closet! Cant recommend these hangers enough!! I never have slippage, they dont make an annoying clacking sound or bounce around like plastic hangers, and they dont break for anything, and have never had them bend... super sturdy and durable, and very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe how Super Space Saving these hangers are
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how Super Space Saving these hangers are! We just love them and the fact that nothing slips off them and ends up on floor. They added so much organization in our closet that we saved $5000 not having to renovate our closets. They ADD space that you may not have known you could have! These hangers were so excellent that I ended up buying 5 boxes and I just love them.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: great space saver
customer_reviews.text: i really like these hangers as i have items that wont stay on the hanger. the velvet makes the hanger less slippery. i gave it four stars because they are very fragile and not too good for heavier items. one of them broke rather easily. but they are great for lighter clothing
customer_reviews.author: bearice

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I dislike using a dresser for my clothing and generally only use a dressers for my intimates, socks, sweats and shorts so the majority of my clothes are hung up. The hangers are perfect for all my shirts and hold them in place without leaving marks. They are sturdy enough to also put my jeans on.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: Super Inexpensive Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Thin hangars allow you to fit more in a small space. Velvet layer keeps my blouses from sliding off. Bought 50 to have extra, but because it saves so much space, I stared to hang more clothes and actually ran out!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Non-slip hangers.
customer_reviews.text: Everything that the Seller advertise about this Velvet hanger is good for my storage need. I want to point out there will be a lot of tiny Velvet dust that would come off and it will stick your clothes and your hands too. So make sure you’re not allergic to velvet.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Space savers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers offer two great features, the first is they take up so much less room in your closet than plastic hangers. Second, all of your tops and dresses that fall off other hangers will stay put on these. The velvet fabric clings to them and no more clothes falling in the closet floor. I have been using these for a few years and my teenage granddaughter loved them so much that I bought her enough to redo her entire closet. Now she's happy that she has so much more room to keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Vandermeulen

customer_reviews.title: Strong and space saving.
customer_reviews.text: Really good hangers. Wide enough for mens shirts and the velvet coating keeps my wifes silky tops from slipping off. This was my second order. The first order must have been a return because the hangers were loose in a box and one hanger was broken. The last order was packed much better and all of the hangers arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: MTS II

customer_reviews.title: It was not a good idea!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced ALL of my plastic hangers with these. It was not a good idea. They really don't take up less space. The exact same amount of clothes fit in my closet as before I replaced the hangers- so what was the point? And to make matters worse, the clothes are far too difficult to remove from the hanger, but you will never have to worry about something falling off of the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was always complaining about her clothes slipping off of regular hangers, so I bought her these. She loves them! They're sturdy, well made, attractive, and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: swk247

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Holds items that need to be hung up. I did a before and after measurement of the width taken up by my shirts and there are minimal benefits (less than 0.25"). My wife's side did get more space, but there was too much variability during the hanger transfer that I can't put a number to it. I personally find it annoying that these grip the clothes so well, while I'm putting clothes up.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers to organize your closets with.. no slip clothing .. especially delicate pieces where you don’t want holes to poke through the shoulders. A bit extravagent but worth the one time purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Great but clingy
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these to replace my current bulky wooden hangers to free up some space in my closet. They do exactly that, they are thin and sturdy compared to my old hangers which is great. The one downside for me is the velvet, if used with cotton clothes, which is my entire wardrobe, it's a little difficult placing the hanger in the shirt since it's very clingy hence my 4 star rating if they could have just been thin metal this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Going to try the pant hangers, too!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a new place with a smaller closet, and was not able to fit all of my clothes in my new closet. These save so much space! I went from my closet being packed to having a foot of extra space! I'm thinking about buying the pant hangers, too!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding space
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. After doing some spring cleaning I needed more of these hangers to get organized. Definitely space savers. Not too good for heavy jeans.. maybe one pair per hanger, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: these are just what i needed for my closets. these hangers make my clothes look so much nicer than they are, and it makes my closet look a lot more cohesive. I haven't noticed any fuzz coming off onto the clothes and they seem very durable. this is definitely worth the price. At marshals they 20 packs of these for 20 dollars or more. love these sm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really saves closet space
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought me a set, and I loved how they saved space in my closet. I'd been using the tube-type hangers, and I didn't realize how much room they take on the closet rod. These gave me so much more space because they're thinner. I like the crossbar for belts and for extra sturdiness with heavier clothing. I liked them so much that I bought more!
customer_reviews.author: D. Maurillo

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I certainly read them before investing in anything so I thought I should share my experience. I was on the fence about these for months! Seeing as I already owned 5000 hangers, the thought of buying more made me cringe. But guys!! GET THEM! everything they say is true... your closet is so much more esthetically pleasing. The clothes don’t slip or fall off EVER! I absolutely am so glad I did it! I finally threw all my mismatch hangers away and these are the only ones I’ll ever buy from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice. More space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hangers. Replacing my plastic hangers with these made such a difference. They are slimmer than the regular plastic, so I have much more space on my racks. They look nicer too.
customer_reviews.author: Moez

customer_reviews.title: Adaquate
customer_reviews.text: Three hangers were broken when I took them out of the box. These hangers are not as heavy/sturdy as another brand I have. These hangers are 1/2 the price so it equals out.
customer_reviews.author: Bub's Nana

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED all broken were replaced
customer_reviews.text: These are good hangers and work well with my clothes. But out of the 100 hangers 46 were broken! The box was soft from being jostled around. There were 2 boxes of 30 inside, 15 from each box was broken and some were left loose inside the main box which were broken. The broken pieces were all contained inside the plastic bags (they wrapped sets of 15) but they are shattered. The hangers were broken in several places as if the box tumbled off every high place it went. UPDATE: they have replaced all the broken hangers and sent extras to cover what may have gotten broken. I was very impressed with how the company handled customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Champagne

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers as they are both practical and luxurious, and a nice touch for the guest room. ...These hangers would also make for a good gift for the frugal person in your life who would never spend money on such a luxury. My mother will be getting some this Christmas lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are sturdy and hold heavy coats and sweaters with no problem yet thin enough to be space friendly. I like the non slip velvet which keeps the small straps from falling off. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Helmes

product_meta.title: Zober Non-Slip Velvet Hangers - Suit Hangers (50-pack) Ultra Thin Space Saving 360 Degree Swivel Hook Strong and Durable Clothes Hangers Hold Up-To 10 Lbs, for Coats, Jackets, Pants, & Dress Clothes
feature_bullets: 50 attractive black velvet non slip hangers featuring 360 degree swivel, shiny, chrome hooks and notched shoulders that will make hanging clothes a simple pleasure!

The soft texture of the velvet clothes hangers grips delicate items such as camisoles and tanks with ease, while its sturdy, yet lightweight construction can withstand a maximum weight of 10 pounds ideal for hanging heavy garments such as coats.
Free up to 50 percent more space on a garment rack with the ultra thin profile of these space-saving slim velvet hangers.
The shoulder line on the black velvet hangers is contoured to help preserve clothes shape and features precisely-cut notches for keeping straps in place.

Pant hangers feature a horizontal bar that is covered in luxurious velvet that both grips and prevents creases. Before 1st use: rinse hangers under cold water for 30 seconds to remove any residue and twist the hook with light force to engage the swivel.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars7,528 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
